item.title: List of Software I Keep on My Computers
item.description: In the event that I have to replace a computer these are the software packages that I need to download. General productivity Google Chrome Pycharm Visual studio code Evernote Git WinDirStat (grand perspecive on OSX) Spotify Docker Sublime text For multi-media Openshot Audacity OBS Handbrake FFMPEG Krita Youtube-dl For 3D Work Blender Zbrush (If I need to do some serious 3D work) Windows specific utilities 7zip Gitbash Chocolately (for package management) Sagethumbs (for better thumbnail support) Mac Specific utilities zsh mediaInfo ($0.
